name: Song Board - The Musical Word Game
name_original: Song Board - The Musical Word Game
description:
*******************************************************
Song Board is a musical puzzle board game.
We all love music and we love all kind of songs Rock, Hip - Hop, Love Songs.
This simple game arranges song title in board. Song title is broken in tiles and randomly arranged in grid.
Look at the signers/Band/Album and try to guess songs related to them. Tap the song tiles and guess the song, If you can guess all the songs, you win the level!!
As you cross levels, Song board become complex.

Play this simple,fun board game and check your Music knowledge.

If you are blocked and you don't know the answer, don't give up, use the hint to guess the right answer.

******************************************************
